class.name: GodotcordUserManager
class.brief_description: A wrapper of the Discord Game SDK User Manager.
class.description: A wrapper of the Discord Game SDK User Manager.

method.name: get_user
method.description: Request the user object of [code]user_id[/code]. The user object is returned via the [code]get_user_callback[/code] signal.

method.name: get_current_user
method.description: Returns the user objects of the local user.

method.name: get_current_user_premium_type
method.description: Returns the premium type of the local user.

method.name: has_current_user_flag
method.description: Returns whether the local user has [code]flag[/code].

constants.constant: The user is a discord partner.
The user is a hypesquad events participant
The user is a member of the house of bravery.
The user is a member of the house of brilliance.
The user is a member of the house of balance.
An error has occured while retrieving the premium type.
The user is not a nitro subscriber.
The user is a nitro classic subscriber.
The user is a nitro subscriber.
